headline: If You Bought 1 Share of Eli Lilly in 1984, Here's How Many Shares You Would Own Now
summary: The drugmaker Ely Lilly (NYSE: LLY) has had a very successful run over the long run.  Shares currently trade around $818 and are up 20,030% over the past 40 years.  Given that Eli Lilly has been public for roughly seven decades, it's no surprise that it has conducted a few stock splits.

Given that Eli Lilly has been public for roughly seven decades, it's no surprise that it has conducted a few stock splits.

headline: Eli Lilly and Novo Want to Shake off Ozempic Copycats. Are They Ready to Meet Demand?
summary: The makers of Ozempic and Zepbound are fighting to stop compounded copies of their drugs. But it’s unclear whether they can ramp up production enough.

raw.headline: Eli Lilly and Novo Want to Shake off Ozempic Copycats. Are They Ready to Meet Demand?
raw.summary: The makers of Ozempic and Zepbound are fighting to stop compounded copies of their drugs. But it’s unclear whether they can ramp up production enough.
